mapper.select: select rc.coffee_request_confirm_idx, rc.username, rc.coffee_request_idx, rc.coffee_request_confirm_status, rc.coffee_request_confirm_content, rc.admin_username, rc.coffee_request_confirm_date, r.coffee_request_amount as coffeeRequestAmount from coffee_request_confirm as rc inner join coffee_request r on r.company_info_idx = rc.company_info_idx inner join company_info as i on r.company_info_idx = i.company_info_idx;

SELECT ci.company_info_name as companyInfoName, ci.company_info_phone as companyInfoPhone, ci.company_info_address as companyInfoAddress FROM coffee_request_confirm crc INNER JOIN company_info ci ON ci.company_info_idx = crc.company_info_idx;
